file_prerequisites.title: file_prerequisites
file_prerequisites.description:
Prerequisites for this trader file. If these prerequisites exist and are not met, none of the trade prerequisites and actions defined in this file will be considered. Note that in particular this means that unmet prerequisites does not block any trades!
You might want to use use_npc_for_prereqs for these prerequisites.

trades.description: List of trades that are restricted. Unrestricted trades need not be specified.
trades.title: trades

index.description: Which trade this prerequisite restricts. First trade = 0. Must be unique for this NPC!
